en-US.name: Space Pack
en-US.summary: The space pack is a great addition because you will hear facts about space.
en-US.description: The space pack expands the set of facts shared with you to include facts about space.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The space pack adds over 10 space facts into the set of facts randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the space pack.  You now have access to space facts!
